==TASTYL EXAMPLE PROGRAMS==
The following example programs in TASTYL, the input language of TASTY, demonstrate some key features and use cases of TASTY:

 * Evaluate circuits generated with Fairplay compiler (in [http://code.google.com/p/tastyproject/source/browse/tastyl/examples/fairplay_circuit.py TASTYL])
 * Easily combine homomorphic encryption and garbled circuits `[`KSS10`]` (in [http://code.google.com/p/tastyproject/source/browse/tastyl/examples/reference.py TASTYL])
 * Privacy-Preserving Set Intersection of `[`FNP04`]`, `[`LP09`]` (in [http://code.google.com/p/tastyproject/source/browse/tastyl/examples/set_intersection.py TASTYL])
 * Privacy-Preserving Face Recognition of `[`SSW09`]` (in [http://code.google.com/p/tastyproject/source/browse/tastyl/examples/fairplay_circuit.py TASTYL])
